TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowCompilerResults extends System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents the results of a workflow compilation. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of the WorkflowCompilerResults class, and assumes that `results` is of type WorkflowCompilerResults, which is created earlier in the file. The code also creates new instances of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters> classes and sets some values. This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK Sample from the WizardForm.cs file. For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408).
[!code-cs[WF_Samples#99](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets1.cs#99)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#99](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets1.vb#99)]

Docs.summary: Gets the that was produced during compilation of the workflow.
